title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ericsson Innovation: Optimizing Mobile Networks & Unified Development with AWS
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 爱立信创新：利用AWS优化移动网络与统一开发
abstract: Discover how Ericsson leverages AWS AI solutions to revolutionize mobile networks through two groundbreaking use cases. First, explore Ericsson's journey toward Autonomous Network AI multi-agents and reinforcement learning solutions, automating RAN optimization, cutting operational effort by up to 50% while dynamically improving network coverage, capacity, and quality. Second, witness Ericsson's solution to knowledge de-fragmentation in complex telecom development. Using AWS services, including custom SageMaker models and Amazon Q Developer, Ericsson created an AI-native environment that breaks down information silos and accelerates innovation. Learn how Ericsson harnesses Amazon Bedrock, SageMaker, and Q Developer for future innovation in Agentic AI.
abstract_cn: 探索爱立信如何通过两个突破性用例利用AWS AI解决方案革新移动网络。首先，了解爱立信在自主网络AI多智能体和强化学习解决方案方面的发展历程，实现RAN优化自动化，将运营工作量减少高达50%，同时动态改善网络覆盖、容量和质量。其次，见证爱立信解决复杂电信开发中知识碎片化问题的方案。利用AWS服务，包括定制SageMaker模型和Amazon Q Developer，爱立信创建了一个AI原生环境，打破信息孤岛并加速创新。了解爱立信如何利用Amazon Bedrock、SageMaker和Q Developer推动智能体AI的未来创新。

presenter.name: Ibrahim Eldeftar
presenter.title: Head of Telco AI Product Management
